DOC.brief_summary: A worldwide study in obese patients to assess the efficacy, safety, and tolerability of an investigational drug.
DOC.brief_title: A Study of MK0364 in Obese Patients (0364-014)
DOC.criteria: Body Mass Index (BMI) between 3043 kg/m2 History of major psychiatric disorder History of seizures or at high risk of developing seizures Blood pressure greater than 160/100 Fasting blood glucose greater than 126 mg/dL Triglycerides greater than 600 mg/dL
